Change Requirement Metadata.Old Content: AC-1: The system shall allow users to upload CSV files containing customer data.
Change Requirement Metadata.New Content: AC-1: The system shall allow users to upload CSV or Excel files containing customer data.
AC-3: The system shall validate the uploaded file format and display an error message for unsupported formats.

Change Requirement Metadata.Old Content: AC-2: The system shall restrict file uploads to a maximum size of 10MB.
